name: Disdice
description:
KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

MOVE – wasd  
SHOOT – Left mouse button
AIM – Mouse Pointer
SHAKER – Space
PAUSE GAME – Esc

The main character is a 6-sided die that has to fight the other types of dice: the D4s, D10s and D20s. All this to assert his supremacy, because now the other types of dice seem to be taking over. The goal is to defend himself as much as possible within the map. There is no real ending: the goal is to survive as much as possible, as the dice increase, and to score the best score. You have at your disposal six weapons given by the number of faces that come up immediately after activating the "SHAKE" function. Each weapon is held by a different dice variant.

Game submitted for the  Bay Area Jam Jam

Team Artoomics

Game designers: Eleonora Blandini - Fabio Cao
Concept artist: Fabio Bonu'
Developer: Pietro Prebianca
Animators: Ilaria Brandolese - Mara Piazzalunga - Linda Pirovano
Sound designer: Aleksandr Fedoseev
